update_every.title: Update every
update_every.description: Data collection interval, measured in seconds.

autodetection_retry.title: Detection retry
autodetection_retry.description: Recheck interval in seconds. Zero means no recheck will be scheduled.

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL of the dcgm-exporter Prometheus endpoint.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The timeout in seconds for the HTTP request.

max_time_series.title: Time series limit
max_time_series.description: If an endpoint returns more time series than this limit, the data is not processed. Set to 0 for no limit.

max_time_series_per_metric.title: Time series per metric limit
max_time_series_per_metric.description: Metrics with more time series than this limit are skipped. Set to 0 for no limit.

vnode.title: Vnode
vnode.description: Associates this data collection job with a Virtual Node.

bearer_token_file.title: Bearer token file
bearer_token_file.description: The path to the file with Bearer token.

proxy_url.title: Proxy URL
proxy_url.description: The URL of the proxy server.

headers.title: Headers
headers.description: Additional HTTP headers to include in the request.

tls_skip_verify.title: Skip TLS verification
tls_skip_verify.description: If set, TLS certificate verification will be skipped.

tls_ca.title: TLS CA
tls_ca.description: The path to the CA certificate file for TLS verification.

tls_cert.title: TLS certificate
tls_cert.description: The path to the client certificate file for TLS authentication.

tls_key.title: TLS key
tls_key.description: The path to the client key file for TLS authentication.

not_follow_redirects.title: Not follow redirects
not_follow_redirects.description: If set, the client will not follow HTTP redirects automatically.

force_http2.title: Force HTTP2
force_http2.description: If set, forces the use of HTTP/2 protocol for all requests, even over plain TCP (h2c).
